attributes.action: Why to pay tax on foreign income as it is not considered to get home mortgage.
attributes.background: Once you get Residency of UK, you are liable to pay income tax on your all the foreign income alongwith UK income. In the contradicting way, these foreign income is not considered by most of the nationalized bank to lend you home mortgage even for the first time buyer.
